metadata.name: GN Twitter Star
metadata.description:
I drew this work while flying back home from another country. I flew at night and I was lucky to take a seat at the porthole, so I was able to look at the night sky. The sky was very clear, the lights were turned off on the plane and my neighbours were asleep, so the light from the smartphones didnt shune in the window and didnt interfere with the view. And, you won't believe it, I saw the milky way and myriads of stars, I saw a whole meteor shower while I was looking and I can't describe how beautiful it was.  
Remembering this beautiful view, I am filled with inspiration. And I want to share this inspiration with you.  
We all on Twitter wish each other Goodnight every day and I want to say Goodnight to you in such a magical way, because the night is the most mysterious and beautiful time of the day when miracles happen and we all become stars in our dreams. 
GN my Twitter Stars â™¥
